languages.text: "Это дерзкая гипотеза. Но Омниссия учит, что бестрепетный разум может покорить анализом всякое Знание. Там, где несведущий увидит ересь, просвещенный может узреть истину".

traits.locale_text: "Омниссия сотворил множество даров, и было бы самодовольной хулой считать, что мы в достаточной мере постигли все их. Порой Знание оказывается слишком сложно, чтобы без ошибки распознать его неискаженную природу".

languages.text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."
languages.original_text: "Это дерзкая гипотеза. Но Омниссия учит, что бестрепетный разум может покорить анализом всякое Знание. Там, где несведущий увидит ересь, просвещенный может узреть истину".

traits.locale_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

"Omnissiah created countless gifts, and to claim we have comprehended them all would be hubris and blasphemy. Sometimes knowledge is too sophisticated for us to decipher its true nature and not make a mistake."
"That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."
"That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."
"That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."
"That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

languages.text: "Das ist eine gewagte Hypothese. Und doch lehrt der Omnissiah uns, dass ein unverzagter Verstand durch Analyse jedes Wissen durchdringen kann. Wo der Ignorante Ketzerei sieht, kann der Erleuchtete die Wahrheit sehen."
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine gewagte Hypothese. Und doch lehrt der Omnissiah uns, dass ein unverzagter Verstand durch Analyse jedes Wissen durchdringen kann. Wo der Ignorante Ketzerei sieht, kann der Erleuchtete die Wahrheit sehen."

languages.text: « Une philosophie des plus audacieuses. Pourtant, l'Omnimessie nous enseigne qu'à force d'analyse, un esprit intrépide peut appréhender n'importe quelle connaissance. Ce qui n'est qu'hérésie aux yeux des ignorants peut être une révélation pour les éclairés. »
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: « Une philosophie des plus audacieuses. Pourtant, l'Omnimessie nous enseigne qu'à force d'analyse, un esprit intrépide peut appréhender n'importe quelle connaissance. Ce qui n'est qu'hérésie aux yeux des ignorants peut être une révélation pour les éclairés. »

languages.text: “这是个大胆的假设，不过欧姆尼塞亚确实教导过我们：无畏的头脑可以通过分析理解一切知识。同样的知识，在无知者眼中可能会是异端邪说，而在开明之人的眼中或许就是真理。”
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: “这是个大胆的假设，不过欧姆尼塞亚确实教导过我们：无畏的头脑可以通过分析理解一切知识。同样的知识，在无知者眼中可能会是异端邪说，而在开明之人的眼中或许就是真理。”

languages.text: 「それは大胆な仮説だ。しかし、万機神は私たちに、怖れ知らずの心は分析を通じてどんな知識も突き破れると教えている。無知な者が異端と捉えることを、啓示を受けた者は真実と見ることができるかもしれぬ」
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: 「それは大胆な仮説だ。しかし、万機神は私たちに、怖れ知らずの心は分析を通じてどんな知識も突き破れると教えている。無知な者が異端と捉えることを、啓示を受けた者は真実と見ることができるかもしれぬ」

languages.text: «Esa es una hipótesis muy osada. Sin embargo, el Omnissiah nos enseña que una mente sin miedo puede alcanzar cualquier Conocimiento a través del análisis. Donde los ignorantes ven herejía, los iluminados pueden ver la verdad».
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: «Esa es una hipótesis muy osada. Sin embargo, el Omnissiah nos enseña que una mente sin miedo puede alcanzar cualquier Conocimiento a través del análisis. Donde los ignorantes ven herejía, los iluminados pueden ver la verdad».

languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

languages.text: "Bu cüretkâr bir hipotez. Yine de Hermesih bize korkusuz bir zihnin, analizler yoluyla İrfana ulaşabileceğini öğretir. Aydınlanmış bir zihin, cahillerin kâfirlik olarak gördüğü bir şeyi gerçek olarak görebilir."
languages.original_text: "That is a bold hypothesis. And yet the Omnissiah teaches us that a dauntless mind can penetrate any Knowledge through analysis. Where the ignorant see heresy, the enlightened might see truth."

traits.locale_text: "Bu cüretkâr bir hipotez. Yine de Hermesih bize korkusuz bir zihnin, analizler yoluyla İrfana ulaşabileceğini öğretir. Cahillerin kâfirlik olarak gördüğü bir şeyi, aydınlanmış bir zihin gerçek olarak görebilir."
